definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Chinese began buying pecans in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 中國人從2004年開始買山核桃。

sentences.english: The smell of the pecan trees, the black walnut with flesh I can still smell.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然可以聞到山核桃樹的氣味和黑核桃果仁的芬芳。
他說，“山核桃只是有點點小貴。

sentences.english: This experiment studied the supercritical CO2 fluid extraction(SFE-CO2) technology of Carya kernel oil(CKO).
sentences.chinese: 對超臨界CO2萃取山核桃油的工藝條件進行了實驗。

sentences.english: Or sweet potato casserole and pecan pie.
sentences.chinese: 或者香甜土豆焙盤和山核桃派。

sentences.english: Georgia is usually the biggest pecan producer.
sentences.chinese: 喬治亞州是最大的山核桃產地。

sentences.english: The dishes include Jambalaya stew, pecan pie and roasted salmon.
sentences.chinese: 包括賈巴拉亞燉的菜，山核桃餡餅和烤鮭魚。

sentences.english: It is an industrial and processing center in a pecan - and peanut - growing area. Population, 78,122.
sentences.chinese: 它是山核桃和花生種植區中的工業和製造業中心。

sentences.english: "Every piece of criticism is a pecan, " Billye said.
sentences.chinese: 她說，“每個批評都像一個山核桃。

sentences.english: The hams were cured over a hickory fire.
sentences.chinese: 這些火腿是在山核桃木的火上薰制的。

sentences.english: The ether extracting technology of carya kernel oil was experimentally studied in this work.
sentences.chinese: 對乙醚浸提法提取山核桃油的工藝條件進行了試驗。

definition: Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry/Chinese bayberry/Japanese bayberry/Myrica rubra/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
